casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antwan ANTHONY 324A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 18, 2016

Ms. Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Attorney at Law, For Anthony, Antwan.

Ms. Kimberly Robb, Assistant District Attorney, Mr. Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of November 2016 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of November 2016."

Court reporter shall have up to and including the 21st day of December 2016 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel.
